definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Paper is one of the most popular handbag making materials.
sentences.chinese: 铜版纸是一种最普及的手提袋制作材料。

sentences.english: I inquired about how many suitcases I would be allowed to bring and what the living accommodations would be.
sentences.chinese: 我询问我可以带多少个手提箱，食宿条件如何。

sentences.english: Everything in my suitcase was jumbled together.
sentences.chinese: 我手提箱里的一切都混在一起了。

sentences.english: She reached down, picked up a suitcase, and put it back in the van.
sentences.chinese: 她弯下腰，拎起一个手提箱放回货车里。

sentences.english: A suitcase is enough to take your clothes with you on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 一只手提箱足够装得下度假时替换的衣服。

sentences.english: Please fasten these tags on your hand-carry luggage.
sentences.chinese: 请把这些标签系在您的手提行李上。

sentences.english: Which ONE of the following brand is link to obsolete?
sentences.chinese: 以下哪一个手提电话品牌令你联想是过气？

sentences.english: She had her handbag robbed in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 她的手提包在大白天里给人抢去了。

sentences.english: TOMMY: Ken, you get the first run of counterfeit cash TOMMY: and put three mil in briefcases.
sentences.chinese: 肯，你先去准备假钞，然后放个三百万到手提箱内。

sentences.english: Then she reached into her handbag and took out her ATM card.
sentences.chinese: 然后她伸手到她手提包里拿出她的银行卡。

sentences.english: Khaki tote bags and metallic suede clutch bags appeal to you, since you want your accessories to be as eclectic as you are.
sentences.chinese: 卡其布或金属的小山羊皮裁制手提包都很衬你哦。

sentences.english: The most convenient and generally used device is a simple hand - held smoke puffer .
sentences.chinese: 最方便和被广泛采用的装置是一种简单的手提发烟器。

sentences.english: He had left his case on the 4∶40 train.
sentences.chinese: 他把手提箱丢在4点40分的火车上了。

sentences.english: You hear constant calls from street corner vendors ("Handbag?
sentences.chinese: 你能听到街边的小贩商叫卖“要手提包吗？

definition: to carry (esp. slung over the arm, shoulder or side)
to lift/to carry in one's hand/Taiwan pr. [ling1]
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
